subject: Sports Injuries
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marian Hossa, 35, has 24 goals and 26 assists in 57 games. He was injured in Saturday’s 5-1 victory over the Pittsburgh Penguins.
snippet: Marian Hossa, 35, has 24 goals and 26 assists in 57 games. He was injured in Saturday’s 5-1 victory over the Pittsburgh Penguins.
